item.title: PI how do i change npc name
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“ultimateGodz, post:2, topic:436122”]Find Bob in ur source
this is how u should think … like i dont get why people dont do this automatic.

  1. remeber bob’s npc id
    2search for bob in your source … change all the bob’s in your source but make sure its the rigth npc id in the folowing code repeat until u cant find bob.[/quote]That’ll only change it on the server side of things…

To change the actual name you have to rename him in EntityDef.java on the client side of things… :I

Read full topic
